SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS CORP_CD as corp_cd , CORP_NM as corp_nm FROM TB_CORP WHERE CORP_TYPE = 'LN' AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND CORP_CD = #{userCorpCd}
AND 1 = 1
AND 1 = 0

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(LM.BIZ_LOAN_AMT), 0) AS biz_loan_amt , IFNULL(SUM(LM.SPOT_LOAN_AMT), 0) AS spot_loan_amt , IFNULL(SUM(LM.ETC_LOAN_AMT), 0) AS etc_loan_amt , IFNULL(SUM(LM.TOT_LOAN_AMT), 0) AS tot_loan_amt , IFNULL(SUM(LM.RECV_AMT), 0) AS recv_amt , IFNULL(SUM(LM.REMAIN_AMT), 0) AS remain_amt FROM TB_CHAIN TC LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT M.CHAIN_NO , MIN(M.CONT_DT) AS MIN_CONT_DT , MAX(M.CONT_DT) AS MAX_CONT_DT , IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN M.LOAN_TYPE = 'L01001' THEN M.PRINC_AMT ELSE NULL END), 0) AS BIZ_LOAN_AMT , IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN M.LOAN_TYPE = 'L02001' THEN M.PRINC_AMT ELSE NULL END), 0) AS SPOT_LOAN_AMT , IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN M.LOAN_TYPE IN('L01001', 'L02001') THEN NULL ELSE M.PRINC_AMT END), 0) AS ETC_LOAN_AMT , IFNULL(SUM(M.PRINC_AMT), 0) AS TOT_LOAN_AMT , IFNULL(SUM(SC.RECV_AMT), 0) AS RECV_AMT , IFNULL(SUM(SC.REMAIN_AMT), 0) AS REMAIN_AMT FROM TB_LOAN_MST M LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT LOAN_NO , SUM(RECV_PRINC_AMT) AS RECV_AMT , SUM(REMAIN_PRINC_AMT) AS REMAIN_AMT FROM TB_LOAN_REPAY_SCHEDULE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY LOAN_NO ) SC ON SC.LOAN_NO = M.LOAN_NO WHERE M.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND M.LOAN_STATUS = '01'
GROUP BY M.CHAIN_NO ) LM ON TC.CHAIN_NO = LM.CHAIN_NO JOIN TB_USER TU ON TU.USER_ID = TC.CEO_ID JOIN TB_CORP CO ON CO.CORP_CD = TC.CORP_CD AND CO.CORP_TYPE = 'LN' WHERE TC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TC.SVC_STAT IN ('R', 'O')
AND TC.CHAIN_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sch_chain_nm}, '%')
AND TC.CORP_CD = #{sch_corp_cd}
AND TC.CORP_CD = #{userCorpCd}
AND 1 = 1
AND 1 = 0

SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS LOAN_NO AS loan_no , SC_SEQ AS sc_seq , SC_DATE AS sc_date , REPAY_PRINC_AMT AS repay_princ_amt , REPAY_INT_AMT AS repay_int_amt , REPAY_TOT_AMT AS repay_tot_amt , BALANCE_AMT AS balance_amt , RECV_PRINC_AMT AS recv_princ_amt , RECV_INT_AMT AS recv_int_amt , RECV_TOT_AMT AS recv_tot_amt , REMAIN_PRINC_AMT AS remain_princ_amt , REMAIN_INT_AMT AS remain_int_amt , REMAIN_TOT_AMT AS remain_tot_amt , CASE WHEN SC_DATE <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') THEN CASE RECV_YN WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'D' END ELSE 'N' END AS recv_yn , CASE WHEN SC_DATE <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') THEN CASE RECV_YN WHEN 'Y' THEN '납부' ELSE '미납' END ELSE '대기' END AS recv_yn_nm , RECV_DT AS recv_dt , SUB_TRANS_YN AS sub_trans_yn , SUB_TRANS_NO AS sub_trans_no , DATE_FORMAT(SUB_TRANS_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS trans_dttm , DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(UPT_DTTM, ENT_DTTM), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS upt_dttm , USE_YN AS use_yn , IFNULL(UPT_USER_ID, ENT_USER_ID) AS upt_user_id FROM TB_LOAN_REPAY_SCHEDULE WHERE LOAN_NO = #{loan_no} ORDER BY SC_SEQ ASC

SELECT CASE WHEN IFNULL(SUM(SC.RECV_AMT), 0) > 0 OR IFNULL(SUM(SC.TRANS_CNT), 0) > 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS change_chk FROM TB_LOAN_MST LM LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT LOAN_NO , SUM(RECV_TOT_AMT) AS RECV_AMT , SUM(REMAIN_TOT_AMT) AS REMAIN_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN SUB_TRANS_YN = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE NULL END) AS TRANS_CNT FROM TB_LOAN_REPAY_SCHEDULE WHERE LOAN_NO = #{loan_no} GROUP BY LOAN_NO ) SC ON SC.LOAN_NO = LM.LOAN_NO JOIN TB_CHAIN TC ON TC.CHAIN_NO = LM.CHAIN_NO AND TC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TC.SVC_STAT IN ('R', 'O') JOIN TB_CORP CO ON CO.CORP_CD = LM.CORP_CD JOIN TB_USER TU ON TU.USER_ID = TC.CEO_ID WHERE LM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND LM.LOAN_NO = #{loan_no} LIMIT 1
